query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  s.name as service_name,
  s.code as service_code,
  c.name as country_name,
  a.name as api_name,
  a.currency,
  a.exchange_rate,
  a.profit_percentage,
  p.smshub_price as custo_original_centavos,
  p.our_price as preco_final_centavos
FROM prices p
JOIN services s ON p.service_id = s.id
JOIN countries c ON p.country_id = c.id
JOIN sms_apis a ON p.api_id = a.id
WHERE s.code = 'ot' AND a.id = 2
LIMIT 1
